verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I’ve wandered far away from God, Now I’m coming home; The paths of sin too long I’ve trod, Lord, I’m coming home.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Coming home, coming home, Never more to roam, Open wide Thine arms of love, Lord, I’m coming home.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I’ve wasted many precious years, Now I’m coming home; I now repent with bitter tears, Lord, I’m coming home.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I’m tired of sin and straying, Lord, Now I’m coming home; I’ll trust Thy love, believe Thy word, Lord, I’m coming home.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My soul is sick, my heart is sore, Now I’m coming home; My strength renew, my home restore, Lord, I’m coming home.
